text: The Citroën C5 is a car produced by Citroën. It replaced the Citroën Xantia in 2001, and entered its second generation in 2008. Like the Xantia before it, it's available as a hatchback or an estate. In 2021, Citroen revived the nameplate with the "C5 X" crossover SUV-styled station wagon. Category:Front wheel drive vehicles Category:2000s automobiles Category:2010s automobiles
title: Citroën C5
